title: How Twitter has shaped the Trump campaign
description:
Trump spends a lot of time talking about issues that do well on Twitter. Vox’s Jane Coaston explains what that reveals about his campaign.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: How Twitter has shaped the Trump campaign
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Bruce Ohr, Section 230, Hunter Biden’s emails: all catnip for conservative Twitter. But does most of the American public care?
